channel.title: Agentic Brahim's Blog
channel.description: Thoughts on AI, LLMs, RAG systems, and building intelligent applications for Africa

item.title: Why I'm Building AI for Africa
item.description: Africa has unique challenges that require unique solutions. Here's my journey building AI systems that serve African communities, starting with agriculture and mining.
item.content:encoded:
Africa has unique challenges that require unique solutions. Here's my journey building AI systems that serve African communities, starting with agriculture and mining.
